Text: Is this the newest one?

So you still can't play online? :( sad face
How do you run this...

You need Java installed.
http://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp

Yes, you can play online, just make sure the server has
online-mode=false
verify-names=false
in the config.
If the server is configured like that, you and anyone who purchased the game can connect and play, just use the name spoofer if you don't have a game account.

Tunngle is not necessary to play with your friends, as long as you each use a different player name.

You still can't join servers that have account protection, which petty much all servers listed on the minecraft site have, but you can join a lan mode server over the internet, and it's not hard to set one up.

I keep getting this error, "Failed to Launch. Fatal Error occured (5): null. Extracting: lwjgl.jar.lzma to lwjgl.jar".

I had it working before but It just stopped working for me.
if you have the failed to launch error you need to download the new exe from the site

Just delete /BIN/ Folder in .minecraft, and game will update.

Then you will be able to use minecraft_name.jar.

alternatively you can download the official EXE.
http://www.minecraft.net/download/Minecraft.exe
or
http://www.minecraft.net/download/Minecraft.exe?v=445

@random1283 
The skin is included

.minecraft/bin/skins

you just need to install it into minecraft.jar in bin folder.
